solution_line_template: If Jefferson has {jefferson_bananas} bananas, then Walter has {jefferson_bananas} bananas - {fewer_bananas_walter_has} bananas = <<{jefferson_bananas}-{fewer_bananas_walter_has}={walter_bananas}>>{walter_bananas} bananas

When they combine their bananas, they have a total of {walter_bananas} bananas + {jefferson_bananas} bananas = <<{walter_bananas}+{jefferson_bananas}={total_combined_bananas}>>{total_combined_bananas} bananas.

After dividing the bananas equally, Walter gets {total_combined_bananas} bananas/{number_of_people_sharing} = <<{total_combined_bananas}/{number_of_people_sharing}={walter_gets_after_sharing}>>{walter_gets_after_sharing} bananas
